kw.name: Create Campaign Text Lesson
kw.msg:
----This test case creates campaign with---- 1. Text lesson
Creating lesson with one card Clicking on Lessons button from side menu Click on Create lesson button Verifying Create new lesson tab is displayed Create a new lesson tab is displayed Clicked on Blank lesson Creating New lesson Entered lesson name ::Lesson_for_1Campaign_with_TextCard1 Text card Click on (+) icon Clicked on Text Card Entering Text in Text card Verifying entered text is displaying text card Verified Text 'This is for Campaign' is displayed in Text Card Publishing lesson Clicked on publish button Lesson published
Lesson is displayed in Grid ::Lesson_for_1Campaign_with_TextCard1
Creating Campaign Campaigns page displayed Clicking on Create Campaign button Create Campaign page is displayed Title entered ::campTitle Description entered ::campDescription Adding Lesson
Verifying Added lesson is displayed in Grid Lesson displayed in grid Clicking on save & exit button
Verifying campaign detail page is displayed Campaign detail page is displayed Campaign 'Campaign_For_Text_Lesson' displayed in Grid
----Text Execution Completed----
Clicking on Lessons button from side menu 1
